sentences.sentence: It is part of the commemorations around the country.
sentences.translation: 作为全国纪念活动的一部分。

sentences.sentence: But it is Venezuela that will kick off the big commemorations.
sentences.translation: 然而，委内瑞拉将首先举办大型纪念活动。

sentences.sentence: This tone has prevailed through subsequent commemorations and debates.
sentences.translation: 这一基调在过去的纪念活动和辩论中成为主流。
